price: Na akawapelekea ndege makundi kwa makundi,
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu aliwasalitisha na majeshi ya ndege yaliyo watokea makundi kwa makundi yakifuatana, na yakawazunguka kila upande.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
